Hedgehog Mobile Launcher

I always wanted to try out some more fancy things using Damned Robotics and decided to build a surface to surface missile launcher. In an RP setting I see it as a multipurpose vehicle that can be outfitted many ways, a missile launcher being just one of them. One button (0) deploys it, using 7 and 8 to angle the missiles for launch, and 9 repackages it for redeployment. It has a huge range (usually the missiles go so far they just disappear), and is highly accurate. You can easily hit any of the facilities from the runway if you aim properly.

It uses Damned Robotics, Katerpillar-Wheels mod, JellyCubes Advanced Modular Missiles, and parts from the C7 Aerospace pack (the pack from before 0.15).

Pictures!

As it unpacks, the top doors open, the front swings open, the stabilizers deploy and the missiles elevate all in one go.

The missile angle can be adjusted in accordance with the range of your target.

The stabilizers in action, preventing any motion from throwing off your aim.

And once you\'re ready, hit space to FIRE! There are 4 individual shots.

Notes:

The firing order is left SIDE, right SIDE, right TOP, left TOP.

If the angle is too high, the right side missile may knock the right top missile off (although your vehicle should remain unharmed otherwise).

When repackaging, don\'t close everything too far.. You\'ve been warned!

S is forwards where as W is backwards for some reason. A and D remain correct, however I recommend you travel in straight lines, turn, and then continue, not a mix.

Enjoy!
That is some professional, grade-a work right there my friend. Good job.
